flawed_nl_solution:
If Isabella has $15 more than Giselle, she has $120+$15 = $135
Combined, Isabella and Giselle has $135+$120=$<<135+120=525>>525
Isabella has $45 more than Sam, meaning Sam has $135-$45=$90
Together, Sam, Isabella, and Giselle has $525+$90=$<<525+90=615>>615
if they donate the money to 3 shoppers at their local town's supermarket who then decides to share it equally, each shopper will receive $615/3=$<<615/3=205>>205
#### 205

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 255, not 525. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
